Latest Projects

Sugar

in progress

A modular web framework for Elixir.

My take on a modular framework, taking notes from my experiences with other established MVC web frameworks including MVC4 and Laravel.

Learn More

ChatBlend

in progress

This webchat/text tool offers an on-demand, real time customer service platform, maximizing engagement and sales potential. With mobile traffic expected to surpass desktop traffic by 2015, ChatBlend allows users to SMS chat with multiple customers in a single platform.

Learn More

Acvte

published 02 Sept 2013

A markdown blog based off of @natew's obtvse2, which was originally inspired by svbtle, using Today theme contributed to obtvse2 by @shilov. This is basically a direct port of obtvse2 using the revel framework for go, and it was never intended for it to be any more than that. This project was just an exercise in getting comfortable with go and revel.

Learn More

About Shane

A polyglot web developer. Current interests include Elixir, Go, MVC4, PHP frameworks (Phalcon and Laravel), and DevOps when necessary.

Works at Blackstone Media / StarkNine by day.
